SELECT rc.id, rc.status, rc.receive_account AS email, rc.retry_count, nts.is_manual_retry, tl.title AS template_type, rc.failed_reason, rc.creation_date FROM notify_mailing_record rc LEFT JOIN notify_send_setting nts ON nts.code = rc.send_setting_code LEFT JOIN notify_template tl ON rc.template_id = tl.id WHERE rc.status IS NOT NULL
AND nts.fd_level = #{level}
AND rc.status = #{status}
AND rc.receive_account LIKE concat(concat('%',#{receiveEmail}),'%')
AND tl.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{templateType}),'%')
AND rc.failed_reason LIKE concat(concat('%',#{failedReason}),'%')
AND ( tl.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR rc.receive_account LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR rc.failed_reason LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
order by rc.id desc
